feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Core 0.11.2 release candidate 1 available

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Core 0.11.2 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Core version 0.11.2rc1 binaries are available for download from bitcoin.org/bin/bitcoin-core-0.11.2/test/. The source code can be found on Github under the signed tag at github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/v0.11.2rc1. This release includes bug fixes, the BIP65 (CLTV) consensus change, and relay policy preparation for BIP113. Preliminary release notes can be found at github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/0.11/doc/release-notes.md. This is a new minor version release of the Bitcoin Core software. Release candidates are test versions of releases, and when no critical problems are found, this release candidate will be tagged as 0.11.2. Bugs should be reported using the issue tracker at github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues. The message also includes a PGP signature.
